header.logoBackgroundImg.title: Logo Background Image
header.logoBackgroundImg.description: Enter the URL location of the background image file to display in the background of the logo. Use img/<file-name> and upload via the File Cabinet.

header.backgroundImg.title: Header Background Image
header.backgroundImg.description: Enter the URL location of the background image file to display in the background of the header. Use img/<file-name> and upload via the File Cabinet.
